thread.title: Jeanne

author: Jeanne
title: Jeanne
text: I got the bar that can be used beside the toilet, and has a place for toilet paper on it. It attaches to the wall and will pull down and then push back up. I used it inside my shower because there was not an outside wall just a shower curtain which would not stop me, should I loose my balance while my eyes were closed while washing my hair. This has worked very well for me.
